Package com.bazaarvoice

Interface Summary
OnBazaarResponse An interface used to define callbacks for when a response to a request is received.
 

Class Summary
BazaarParams The base class for adding parameters to a BazaarRequest.
BazaarRequest Sends and handles requests to the Bazaarvoice API.
DisplayParams Handles the parameters for a display request.
Media Contains byte data for a media object such as a photo or video; used internally for uploading media in a request.
SubmissionFeedbackParams Handles the parameters for feedback submission.
SubmissionMediaParams Handles the parameters for media submission.
SubmissionParams Handles the parameters for content submission.
Utils Contains various utilities; some are used within the SDK, others are intended to help developers with tasks relevant to SDK features.
 

Enum Summary
Action An enum used for defining an action type for content submission.
ApiVersion An enum for the API version to use when making a request.
Equality An enum for all available equality types in BazaarParams requests.
IncludeType An enum for all the different types of content you can include in a request.
Media.MediaType An enum used for defining the type of media associated with an instance of Media.
RequestType An enum for all the different types of requests we can make.
SubmissionFeedbackParams.FeedbackType An enum for all different types of feedback that can be submitted.
SubmissionFeedbackParams.Vote An enum for the different types votes of Helpfulness.
 

Exception Summary
BazaarException An exception type used for problems that arise in the use of the Bazaarvoice SDK.
